  • Constructor Details

    • Diary

      public Diary(String date, String path, int status)
      Constructor of Diary day post. Containing date, relative path to file location and status. Filename should be be constructed of these date. Ex. 20220415.txt at location: root\2022\04 Status is to keep track if the file is new or edited.
      Parameters:
      date - Date "20220415"
      path - Path "root\2022\04"
      status - Status on the library post yet to be implemented.
